Title: Instagram Filter App
Description: This project aims to replicate Instagram's core functionalities, allowing users to upload, share, and engage with photos and videos. It includes features for public and private sharing, commenting, and liking posts. A key focus is on cloning Instagram's filter functionality, enabling users to apply various filters to their photos.

Title: Crown Clothing E-Commerce Website
Description: This is an e-commerce website where users can register and log in with Google. They can add different types of clothes to their cart and check out.

Title: Music Playing Website
Description: This website was inspired by spotify. This website allows the user to register and login. Then the user can upload mp3 files through the manage page. Once the upload is done, the user will be able to play their music, pause on the bottom left part of the page, and be able to toggle the progress bar. The user can edit the name of the song as well as delete it. Other users can view whatever music is uploaded by other users

Title: Dall-e AI Image Generation Website
Description: This web application uses DALL-E AI to generate images. Users can browse images posted by others or create their own by clicking the Create button at the top right of the page. After entering their name and a prompt, or clicking Surprise Me, the AI generates an image. Users can regenerate images if needed. Once satisfied, they can share their creation with the community or download it.
